Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is the player class and has 2 players (black and white) and holds the board we are playing in
    Version:
    2020
    Author:
    Moujan Mirjalili

      • readMove

        public void readMove​(int tile,
                     int position,
                     int rotatingTile,
                     java.lang.String direction,
                     java.lang.String player)
        this method reads the move the player wants to play and checks whether the move is valid or not
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile we want to put our marble in
        position - the position in the tile we want to put our marble in
        rotatingTile - the tile we want to rotate
        direction - the direction we want the tile to rotate (90 degrees clock or non-clockwise)
        player - the player who is playing
